title: 1, 2, & 3 John Week 2 with John Greco
description:
It’s the second and final week of our 1, 2, and 3 John study, and Raechel and Amanda are once again joined by She Reads Truth’s content director, John Greco. Together, they talk about love that casts out fear, the apostle John’s mic drops, and praying with complete confidence, because God has written the end of redemption’s story. These letters are an invitation to walk in God’s love—and to share that love with a world in need. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth 1, 2 & 3 John reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the 1, 2 & 3 John collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 15% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15.


Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/123-john-week-2/
